content: I'm glad you like the ideas. For the gaming console station, I'm thinking of getting a media console with a glass top and metal legs. It's modern and sleek, and it will match the overall aesthetic of my living room. The soundbar I'm looking at is a wall-mounted one with wireless connectivity, so it should be easy to set up and use. I'm also considering getting a few extra throw pillows and blankets in blue to tie in with the accent wall and add more pops of color to the room. Do you think that's a good idea?
